Core:PCProperties.Core:Property: X[S] You mouth becomes inexplicably dry.
X[S] \$(person) appears to have dilated pupils.
(\{ "StoryHostess Topsy, Mon Oct 23 13:43:14 2023", "StoryHostess Topsy, Mon Oct 23 17:05:46 2023", "Giovanni, Mon Oct 23 22:38:52 2023" \})

X[S] \$(person) \{stops breathing for a moment as a convulsion overtakes their body. \|grimaces in pain as their eyes roll back and they briefly lose consciousness before coming to with a shallow gasp. \| appears weakened and unable to breathe properly, their eyes bulging and pulse pounding at a dangerously high rate. \|gasps for air and struggles to speak as tremors continue to ripple through their swollen extremities. \|takes a shallow breath before growing still for a moment, their pulse briefly dropping before becoming dangerously elevated once more. \|clutches at their chest and writhes in pain, desperately gasping for air before going limp again. \|shivers with muscle tremors, their legs beginning to swell and their face red with elevated blood pressure. \|gasps and goes rigid, mumbling inarticulate, panicked words as their veins bulge. \|struggles to breathe before succumbing to violent, full body tremors. \|groans and pants, their chest straining and eyes flicking everywhere in panic before briefly closing. \|sweats profusely, their veins and eyes bulging as their heart rate increases. \}

X[S] \$(person) \{grows red in the face while sweating profusely. \|struggles to catch their breath. \|gasps for air while clutching their chest. \|makes a facial expression of confusion, appearing dizzy and disoriented. \|appears to be suffering from intense dizziness and pain. \}

X[S] \$(person) \{grows deathly pale and struggles to speak as their heart rate increases before swiftly decreasing. \|gasps and clutches their chest in pain before growing redder in the face. \|struggles to breathe for a moment, their eyes going unfocused and their pulse pounding visibly in their neck. \|gasps softly while making a pained, frightened facial expression. \|struggles with a pained look of discomfort and confusion upon their face as they struggle to catch their breath. \}

X[S] \$(person) \{shivers with muscle tremors, their legs beginning to swell and their face red with elevated blood pressure. \|gasps and goes rigid, mumbling inarticulate, panicked words as their veins bulge. \|struggles to breathe before succumbing to violent, full body tremors. \|groans and pants, their chest straining and eyes flicking everywhere in panic before briefly closing. \|sweats profusely, their veins and eyes bulging as their heart rate increases. \}
